name: Blockhead's Blunder
description:
Blockhead's Blunder is a fast paced, surrealistic 3D platformer in early development.

Music by @MimigaMansion, @ChirimoyaGames, and @Mushbuh

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to look
  • Tab for pause menu
